snippet: F.B.I. officials acknowledged  that in the aftermath of the Boston Marathon bombings they had changed procedures for sharing information about people who have been investigated for links to extremists.
abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigation officials acknowledge that in the aftermath of the Boston Marathon bombings they have changed procedures for sharing information about people who have been investigated for links to extremists.
lead_paragraph: F.B.I. officials acknowledged  that in the aftermath of the Boston Marathon bombings they had changed procedures for sharing information about people who have been investigated for links to extremists.

headline.main: F.B.I. Changes Course on Information Sharing
headline.print_headline: F.B.I. Changes Course On Information Sharing
